channel.title: Girl help. Rep++
channel.description: I know what most of you trolls are thinking while you are looking at this title, 'HAHA your such a prude nerd' - Actually I'm not a virgin, I had just gotten out of a serious relationship, and I met this one new girl at my school. I was so fucking nervous because I liked her so much, she gave me no response back. I could never tell if she liked me or not, or if she thought I was hot or not. Well I was just texting her the other night, and she brought up the conversation on 'physical relationships' because she said that she was 'sexually deprived' even though she was already in one of these 'physical relationships' with someone else, I started telling her that she could get anyone in the school, (she actually could, she's the star cheerleader & everything) she replied back, "No way, you totally could, everybody thinks your hot." So, I took advantage of that, I asked her if she wanted to give it a try with me. She replied back, "I just wouldn't want it to ruin our friendship, but whatever happens happens.." The next day we decided to hang out for the day, but with some other friends too. THE WHOLE FUCKING DAY I froze up, I wanted to ask her to come in the back room with me, but I kept thinking that I might blow it, or she is not actually comfortable with it, so I never asked. Next week I will be hanging out with her again but, I need some help from you guys. What should I say to her that will tell her that I want to makeout/have sex/whtever, but w/o it being awkward for her? Seriously, I don't give a fuck what people think about me, but i'm concerned for her, What should I do?

Fiancee then…

Step 1. Lead her into a room alone

Step 2. Pull down your pants

Step 3. She will then realize you have a terribly small penis and will leave

end of story

Lord Typhis:

I know what most of you trolls are thinking while you are looking at this title, ‘HAHA your such a prude nerd’ - Actually I’m not a virgin, I had just gotten out of a serious relationship, and I met this one new girl at my school. I was so fucking nervous because I liked her so much, she gave me no response back. I could never tell if she liked me or not, or if she thought I was hot or not. Well I was just texting her the other night, and she brought up the conversation on ‘physical relationships’ because she said that she was ‘sexually deprived’ even though she was already in one of these ‘physical relationships’ with someone else, I started telling her that she could get anyone in the school, (she actually could, she’s the star cheerleader & everything) she replied back, “No way, you totally could, everybody thinks your hot.” So, I took advantage of that, I asked her if she wanted to give it a try with me. She replied back, “I just wouldn’t want it to ruin our friendship, but whatever happens happens…” The next day we decided to hang out for the day, but with some other friends too. THE WHOLE FUCKING DAY I froze up, I wanted to ask her to come in the back room with me, but I kept thinking that I might blow it, or she is not actually comfortable with it, so I never asked. Next week I will be hanging out with her again but, I need some help from you guys. What should I say to her that will tell her that I want to makeout/have sex/whtever, but w/o it being awkward for her? Seriously, I don’t give a fuck what people think about me, but i’m concerned for her, What should I do?
